patch_metadata.abstract: discrepancy quantity between gme_resource_txns and gme_batch_step_resources
patch_metadata.description:
Functional Description Before: The resource usage data is mismatched between the gme_resource_txns and gme_batch_step_resources table.
After: The resource usage data is matched between the gme_resource_txns and gme_batch_step_resources table.
Technical Description: NA
Reference: 1. LPN added to the issue/return ingredient mobile page. 2. New Yield Measurement details and form changes, Note 2180160.1.
